砯字的基本解释

砯
pīng
水击岩石的声音。

砯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pīng］
［《廣韻》披冰切，平蒸，滂。］
象声词。形容水激岩石声。

砯字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　砯； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页829第16
【集韻】【韻會】?披冰切，音砰。水擊出巖聲。【郭璞·江賦】砯崖鼓作。　又【五音集韻】蒲應切，憑去聲。義同。　又【正字通】韓愈詩：瓿墅輾砯砰。韻會合砯砰爲一，非。

砯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
砯字的起名意思

暂无。

Crotch
Basic explanation of words
Crotch
pīng
The sound of water hitting rocks.
Crotch
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pīng］
["Guangyun" sliced on ice, steamed flat and puffed. ]
Onomatopoeia. Describe the sound of water-induced rock.
Crotch
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　砯; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 829 Chapter 16
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Cut with ice, sound bang. The water hit the rock. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Pianya Drum.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Pu Yingqie, Ping Qusheng. The same meaning.　[Zhengzitong] Han Yushi: Apocalypse Villa is slammed. The rhyme meets the clam and bang as one, not.

Name meaning
Nothing.
pīng
〈象〉
水击岩石声 crack。 如: 砯砰(撞击声); 砯砯(形容水流石罅等声响); 砯碣(因撞击而产生宏大的声响)
